  1. Internship.Management.System
  2. entity

Uses of Package
entity

Packages that use entity
Package
Description
boundary
Contains the boundary classes that handle console interaction with users.
controller
Contains controller classes that coordinate user actions and business logic.
database
Contains repository classes that provide data access and persistence.
entity
Contains domain entity classes representing users, internships and related data.
  • Classes in entity used by boundary
    Class
    Description
    CareerCenterStaff
    Represents a Career Center Staff member who manages internship programs and company relationships.
    CompanyRep
    Represents a Company Representative who manages internship postings and applications for their company.
    Student
    Represents a student user who can apply for internship positions.
  • Classes in entity used by controller
    Class
    Description
    CompanyRep
    Represents a Company Representative who manages internship postings and applications for their company.
    Internship
    Represents an internship posting created by a company representative.
    InternshipApplication
    Represents a student's application to an internship, managing the complete application lifecycle.
    InternshipLevel
    Represents the experience level or complexity of an internship position.
    InternshipStatus
    Represents the approval and availability status of an internship posting.
    Student
    Represents a student user who can apply for internship positions.
    WithdrawalRequest
    Represents a student's request to withdraw from an internship application.

    Minimal read-only application view required by the domain layer.

  • Classes in entity used by entity
    Class
    Description
    ApplicationStatus
    Represents the possible statuses of an application throughout its lifecycle.
    CareerCenterStaff
    Represents a Career Center Staff member who manages internship programs and company relationships.
    CompanyRep
    Represents a Company Representative who manages internship postings and applications for their company.
    CompanyRep.RepPostingReadPort
    Read-port interface for querying posting information from persistence.
    Internship
    Represents an internship posting created by a company representative.
    InternshipApplication
    Represents a student's application to an internship, managing the complete application lifecycle.
    InternshipLevel
    Represents the experience level or complexity of an internship position.
    InternshipStatus
    Represents the approval and availability status of an internship posting.
    Student
    Represents a student user who can apply for internship positions.
    Student.AppReadPort
    Minimal read-only application view required by the domain layer.
    User
    Base user entity shared by students, company representatives, and career center staff.
    WithdrawalRequest
    Represents a student's request to withdraw from an internship application.
    WithdrawalRequestStatus
    Represents the processing status of a withdrawal request submitted by a student.
